aqgninA# raqyima#Snavaqt pOSha#mEqva diqvEdi#vE | 
yaqSasa#M ~MvIqrava#ttamaM ||
gOmA(gm)# aqgnE&vi#mA(gm) aqSvI yaqj~jO nRuqvathsa#KAq sadaqmida#pramRuqShyaH | 
iDA#vA(gm) EqShO a#sura praqjAvA$n dIqrGO raqyiH pRu#thubuqdhnaH saqBAvAn# ||
ApyA#yasvaq>1, santE$>2 || 
iqha tvaShTA#ramagriqyaM ~MviqSvarU#paqmupa# hvayE | aqsmAka#mastuq kEva#laH || 
tanna#stuqrIpaqmadha# pOShayiqtnu dEva# tvaShTaqrvi ra#rAqNaH sya#sva | 
yatO# vIqraH - [  ]   35
